author: Charles Peterson
quote: WHAT A MAN CAN DO IN A DAY, I CAN DO IN TWO

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: TO A MAN, TIME IS THE MOST IMPORTANT THING IN HIS LIFE

author: George Bernard Shaw
quote: YOU DONT STOP PLAYING BECAUSE YOU GROW OLD YOU GROW OLD BECAUSE YOU STOP PLAYING

author: John Muir
quote: WE HAVE IT IN OUR POWER TO BEGIN THE WORLD ANEW

author: Henry David Thoreau
quote: I WANT THE EARTH! IM TIRED OF BEING BURIED UNDER IT!

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: A MAN CAN DO A GREAT DEAL BY NOT DOING

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: DO NOT GO WHERE THE ROAD LEADS, GO INSTEAD WHERE THERE IS NO ROAD

author: Mark Twain
quote: MAN IS THE ONLY ANIMAL THAT BLUSHES  OR NEEDS TO

author: Francis Bacon
quote: IF A MAN BE, HE WILL IF HE IS NOT, HE WILL NOT

author: Alice Walker
quote: THE MOST COMMON WAY PEOPLE GIVE UP THEIR POWER IS BY THINKING THEY DONT HAVE ANY

author: John Burroughs
quote: A GOOD WALK WILL DO MORE FOR THE HUMAN MIND THAN A MONTHS WORK

author: Alice Walker
quote: I WANT TO TELL THE WORLD ABOUT THE GOOD IT CAN DO

author: William Ernest Henley
quote: THE PERSON WHO SAYS IT CANNOT BE DONE SHOULD NOT INTERRUPT THE PERSON DOING IT

author: George Miller
quote: THERES NOTHING TO IT, YOU JUST DO IT

author: Socrates
quote: HE WHO KNOWS NOTHING, FEARS NOTHING

author: Richard Wagner
quote: I NEVER MAKE PREDICTIONS, BECAUSE I NEVER KNOW WHAT WILL HAPPEN

author: Albert Einstein
quote: INNOVATION CANNOT EXIST WITHOUT CHANGE

author: Gary Hamel
quote: INNOVATION IS THE GREATEST BUSINESS INVESTMENT IN THE 21ST CENTURY

author: Tom Peters
quote: INNOVATION IS NOT ENOUGH. YOUR ORGANIZATION MUST HAVE THE RIGHT CULTURE, IN ORDER TO CREATE AND BE INNOVATIVE

quote: A JOB IS JUST A MEANS TO AN END, BUT A PURPOSE IS WHAT ITS ALL ABOUT

quote: ALL OF US IN TECHNOLOGY HAVE A MISSION TO CONNECT EVERYTHING, AND WERE WORKING TO CHANGE THE WORLD IN THE MOST RADICAL WAY

quote: THE MOST IMPORTANT FACT IN THE HISTORY OF EVERY HUMAN BEING IS THE MOMENT OF HIS BIRTH

author: Socrates

author: Derek Bok
quote: YOU ALWAYS HAVE PLENTY OF TIME FOR WHAT YOURE NOT GOING TO DO

author: Ernest Hemingway
quote: THE WAY TO DO A THING RIGHT IS TO DO IT. THE WAY TO DO A THING WITH STYLE IS TO DO IT WITH STYLE.

author: Voltaire
quote: ONE MANS TERRORIST IS ANOTHERS FREEDOM FIGHTER

author: Bruce Lee
quote: A FRIEND IS ONE WHO WALKS IN WHEN THE REST OF THE WORLD WALKS OUT

author: James Thurber
quote: I THINK THAT A MAN SHOULD BE ALLOWED TO MARRY SIX WOMEN, AS LONG AS AT LEAST TWO OF THEM ARE NAMED GLADYS

author: Jonathan Swift
quote: NEVER ATTRIBUTE TO MALICE THAT WHICH IS ADEQUATELY EXPLAINED BY STUPIDITY

author: Will Rogers
quote: ITS A POOR SORT OF MEMORY THAT ONLY WORKS BACKWARDS

author: Bill Cosby
quote: NEVER APOLOGIZE, NEVER EXPLAIN

author: General George S. Patton
quote: AN ARMY IS MADE UP OF MANY DIFFERENT TYPES OF PEOPLE. SOME ARE BRAVE. OTHERS ARE AFRAID. BUT ALL OF US HAVE OUR OWN PERSONAL REASONS FOR DOING WHAT WE DO.

author: Yogi Berra
quote: WHEN YOU COME TO A FORK IN THE ROAD, TAKE IT

author: General Wesley K. Clark
quote: WE HAVE AN OBLIGATION TO FIGHT, AND WE HAVE AN OBLIGATION TO WIN

author: Albert Einstein
quote: IF YOU DONT HAVE ANY STANDARDS, YOU HAVE NO CHANCE OF COMING UP WITH ANYTHING BETTER THAN WHAT YOU HAVE NOW

author: Winston Churchill
